price: "E dizem: 'Glorificado seja nosso Senhor! Por certo, a promessa de nosso Senhor foi cumprida'."
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِن كَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna sub'ḥāna rabbinā in kāna waʿdu rabbinā lamafʿūlan
